subject: It really might be easier to keep using e-mail
msgSnippet: I didn t realize until I tried to use the Post Button that I can t post text in Revised Shaw from the newsgroup.  It HAS to be done from e-mail to the
messageBody:
I didn't realize until I tried to use the Post Button that I can't
post text in Revised Shaw from the newsgroup. It HAS to be done from
e-mail to the newsgroup, anyway! Paige, Jayson, I think you've been
encountered difficulties getting your e-mail programs to work with
Rich Text (fonts, formatting, images, etc.)

Please tell me what mail programs you use, and I'll try to
troubleshoot.

BTW, go to Shavian to see a post I did titled "women." It's
bi-alphabetal. I didn't realize that Jerome had italic capability!
If I do say so myself, italic Jerome looks "frimmin'!"

Jon Zuck
http://surf.to/frimmin

I didn't realize until I tried to use the Post Button that I can't 
post text in Revised Shaw from the newsgroup.  It HAS to be done from 
e-mail to the newsgroup, anyway!  Paige, Jayson, I think you've been 
encountered difficulties getting your e-mail programs to work with 
Rich Text (fonts, formatting, images, etc.)  

Please tell me what mail programs you use, and I'll try to 
troubleshoot.

BTW, go to Shavian to see a post I did titled "women."  It's 
bi-alphabetal. I didn't realize that Jerome had italic capability!  
If I do say so myself, italic Jerome looks "frimmin'!"

Jon Zuck
